B

BaseMetadata - Interface in common
A marker interface that enables multiple metadata sub-types to share a common super-type.
baseOffset - Variable in class common.AbstractByteReader
 
baseOffset - Variable in class heif.boxes.ItemLocationBox.ItemLocationEntry
 
baseOffsetSize - Variable in class heif.boxes.ItemLocationBox
 
batch - package batch
 
Batchable - Interface in batch
 
BatchBuilder - Class in batch
Implements the Builder design pattern for step-by-step construction of a BatchExecutor instance.
BatchBuilder() - Constructor for class batch.BatchBuilder
 
BatchConsole - Class in batch
This is the main console batch executor used for copying media files and updating metadata.
BatchConsole(BatchBuilder) - Constructor for class batch.BatchConsole
Constructs a console interface, using a Builder design pattern to process the parameters and update the copied image files.
BatchErrorException - Exception in batch
This exception is thrown when the running application is terminated abruptly.
BatchErrorException() - Constructor for exception batch.BatchErrorException
Constructs a default BatchErrorException instance without an error message.
BatchErrorException(String) - Constructor for exception batch.BatchErrorException
Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified error message.
BatchErrorException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception batch.BatchErrorException
Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified cause.
BatchErrorException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception batch.BatchErrorException
Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified detail error message and the cause.
BatchExecutor - Class in batch
Automates the batch processing of image files by copying, renaming, and chronologically sorting them based on their EXIF metadata, such as DateTimeOriginal.
BatchExecutor(BatchBuilder) - Constructor for class batch.BatchExecutor
Constructs a BatchExecutor using the provided BatchBuilder configuration.

bitsPerChannel - Variable in class heif.boxes.PixelInformationBox
 
Box - Class in heif.boxes
Represents a generic HEIF Box, according to ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015.
Box(SequentialByteReader) - Constructor for class heif.boxes.Box
Constructs a Box by reading its header from the specified SequentialByteReader.
Box(Box) - Constructor for class heif.boxes.Box
A copy constructor to replicate field values one by one, useful for sub-classing, retaining the original field values.
BOX_SIZE_TO_EOF - Static variable in class heif.boxes.Box
 
BoxCategory() - Constructor for enum heif.HeifBoxType.BoxCategory
 
BoxFactory - Class in heif
 
BoxFactory() - Constructor for class heif.BoxFactory
 
BoxHandler - Class in heif
Handles parsing of HEIF/HEIC file structures based on the ISO Base Media Format.
BoxHandler() - Constructor for class heif.BoxHandler
This default constructor should not be invoked, or it will throw an exception to prevent instantiation.
BoxHandler(Path, SequentialByteReader) - Constructor for class heif.BoxHandler
Constructs a BoxHandler using a file path and byte reader and begins the parsing of the HEIF file.
BoxHandler(Path, byte[]) - Constructor for class heif.BoxHandler
Constructs a BoxHandler using raw byte data.
boxSize - Variable in class heif.boxes.Box
 
boxTypeBytes - Variable in class heif.boxes.Box
 
buffer - Variable in class common.AbstractByteReader
 
bufferIndex - Variable in class common.SequentialByteReader

BYTES_LOOKUP - Static variable in enum heif.HeifBoxType
 
byteUsed - Variable in class heif.boxes.Box
 
byteUsed() - Method in class heif.boxes.Box
Returns the number of bytes already read from this box.
ByteValueConverter - Class in common
Utility class providing static methods for converting raw byte arrays to primitive types, strings, and RationalNumber representations, especially in the context of image metadata parsing, for example: TIFF or PNG.
ByteValueConverter() - Constructor for class common.ByteValueConverter
Default constructor is unsupported and will always throw an exception.
